name: air-cutter
effect: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
short_effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user launches razor-like wind to slash the opposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user launches razor-like wind to slash the opposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user launches razor-like wind to slash the opposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily.
